llm.feedback: Your draft is a placeholder that asks for clarification rather than a concrete analysis. To meet the SECTION FOCUS requirements, first specify the primary asset (e.g., spx, ust10y, mortgage rates) and the exact time horizon (e.g., 3–6 months). Then rewrite the paragraph to state that you will deliver a swing‑trade/outlook strictly for that asset, ensuring every line references the canonical handle and includes a causal transmission path with an inline (ID) citation. Remove any generic “I’m ready” wording and replace it with a concise commitment to produce the requested analysis. If any sentence drifts from the chosen asset, add a citation that ties it back to that asset or delete the sentence.
